meanings.definition: Therapeuses: plural form of therapeuse, a female therapist
meanings.sent1: The therapeuses at the clinic help people feel better.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the therapeuses tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The group of therapeuses decided to have a spa day for themselves.
meanings.sent4: The therapeuses were like healing angels sent to bring comfort.
meanings.sent5: The therapeuses' kind words were like soothing music to my ears.

meanings.definition: Therapeuses: those who provide therapeutic services
meanings.sent1: Many therapeuses work in hospitals and community centers.
meanings.sent2: The therapeuses offer counseling and support to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The therapeuses organized a wellness fair for the community.
meanings.sent4: The therapeuses' care was a beacon of hope for the patients.
meanings.sent5: The therapeuses' dedication to helping others was truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: The therapeuses in our town are known for their empathy.
meanings.sent2: She aspires to be one of the therapeuses who make a difference.
meanings.sent3: The therapeuses hosted a self-care workshop for women.
meanings.sent4: The therapeuses' wisdom and guidance were invaluable to their clients.
meanings.sent5: The therapeuses' presence brought a sense of calm to the room.
